abstract: Kweku M. Adoboli, the former UBS trader charged with fraud, had his case referred to a higher court as more information came to light regarding a $2.3 billion trading loss.
snippet: Kweku M. Adoboli, the former UBS trader charged with fraud, had his case referred to a higher court as more information came to light regarding a $2.3 billion trading loss.

headline.main: Prosecutor Reveals Details of UBS Rogue Trading Case
